There were no other sightings in Midland on or around October 8th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsi was smokeing on the back deck petting the family cat just looking around at other peoples back yards and the sky enjoying the quiet and from behind me.from over the roof a light coming from the north e like on a rail to the south w and vanished.like neon gold either in disc or cresent shape could not tell!
